DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate advance maternal age rationale perform intracytoplasmic morphologically select sperm injection ( IMSI ) . This prospective randomized study include couple undergo intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) result advance maternal age ( ≥ 37 year old ) . Couples randomly allocate receive one two sperm selection procedure ( ICSI , n = 33 ; IMSI , n = 33 ) . The group compare regard fertilization rate , percentage high-quality embryo , implantation , pregnancy miscarriage rate .
DOC.brief_title: Intracytoplasmic Morphologically Selected Sperm Injection Advanced Maternal Age
